sent.orig: The "d" in "grandpa" has been lost by assimilation to "p".
My grandpa's grandpa once ran a business in southeast Asia during the Qing dynasty.
sent.trans: 我爷爷的爷爷清代时曾经在南洋一带做生意。

sent.orig: I telephoned to my parents, eld brother, grandpa and my eld sister, my grandpa's condition optimist.
sent.trans: 今天跟爸妈、哥哥、祖父、姐姐通了一下电话，祖父的病情不容乐观。

sent.orig: Yes, we have to do an old-age insurance Grandpa, Grandpa so carefree life.
sent.trans: 对，我们给爷爷办一个养老保险，让爷爷无忧无虑地安享晚年。

sent.orig: Grandpa came to visit us from China and Andy loves to play with grandpa.
sent.trans: 姥爷从中国来看我们，小小宝很喜欢和姥爷一块玩。
